Text:
Thanks for this great upload.

I've grabbed just the CD, but Nero 10 doesn't recognize the .wv format.

Anyone know what to do?

I've resolved the .wv problem I asked about.

I had downloaded a Nero patch from WavPack without success, but it turned out I just hadn't added it to enough places in Nero 10 (there are Audio Manager folders everywhere!).

Hope this helps anyone else in the same boat.

Anybody who has this willing to convert the DVD Audio to FLAC like: 

http://thepiratebay.org/torrent/5742975/King_Crimson_-_Red_(40th_Anniversary)_%5BFLAC%5D_%5B5.1%5D

or

http://thepiratebay.org/torrent/5723386/King_Crimson_-_In_The_Court_Of_The_Crimson_King_(40th_anniversar
